column5: The Emma villa is one of 4 luxury villas at D6 Retreat. This villa sleeps 5 (queen, twin, full pull-out sofa), has a full kitchen, washer/dryer, access to heated infinity pool, outdoor games, bird watching, hammocks jungle gym & hiking on 23 acres. Each villa has luxury linens, memory foam mattresses, pack n play, booster chair, pet bowls, DirectTV, wifi, AC/heat, dishes, and pots/pans.
column8: Emma Villa: Heated pool, Hiking, Yard Games & More
